name: Airport Master!
description:
You are the manager of an airport!



- You can hire employees and arrange flights with the money that you collect.
- Keep your employees working well, and try to make your passengers happy!



- Open new shops at the airport and serve more passengers!
- Upgrade your planes, seats, food court, and airport security!
- Make investments and growth your airport business!



The best airport idle game!
publishers: Panteon Yazilim Oyun Egitim Teknolojileri ve Hizmetleri San. Tic. Ltd. Sirketi
